About.title: About Us
About.content: Offering a garden, shared lounge and terrace, Bloomtalya Hotel is located in the center of Antalya, 2.1 km from Mermerli Beach. 4.9 km from Antalya Museum, 6.4 km from Antalya Aquarium and 7.1 from Antalya Aqualand km away. The reception is open 24 hours a day and the property also provides airport transfer, room service and free WiFi in all areas. All accommodation units have air conditioning, a flat-screen satellite TV, a refrigerator, a coffee machine, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. A bathroom, a hairdryer and linens are available. Guests of the hotel can enjoy an open buffet breakfast. Popular attractions such as Hadrian's Gate, Antalya Clock Tower and Old City Marina are located near Bloomtalya Hotel. The nearest airport, Antalya Airport, is 7 km away.
